title: Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi
title_original: HTZMO Women Long Sleeve Bodycon Floral Maxi Dress Ruched A Line Flowy Wedding Guest Formal Party Long Dresses

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #49,044 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #147 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful winter dress
items.body: I wore this dress to a winter wedding. Very comfortable and flattering with the gathered fabric and pattern. I ordered a size small. I'm 5'4" and weigh about 122lbs. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I wore this for my wedding! Super comfortable, easy to dance in, and fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Li Lo

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective seams and poor quality
items.body: The side seams above the shoulders are different on each side, making the dress crooked and impossible to wear. The cut and stitching at the bottom are poorly done, giving the dress a cheap appearance. Read more
items.author: BerkenFamily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend
items.body: Comfy, stretchy and looked like the picture Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for wedding
items.body: I loved this dress! Comfortable, true to size, flattering. It was perfect for a wedding. Read more
items.author: Ken and Sheri

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Prettt dress but runs small
items.body: This dress is gorgeous. It reminds me of the dresses I wore in high school in the late 90s. The color, print, and ruching are all lovely. However, it runs smaller than the size chart says, so I haven't even been able to try it on. Also, weirdly, there is no tag or imprint so I am not sure what's the front and what is the back. Read more
items.author: Long Frank

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size
items.body: The fit was perfect. Read more
items.author: Deborah Markiewicz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such an elegant look
items.body: I had so many compliments when I wore this to work. The color is beautiful. The sheer sleeves gives it a sexy but class look. The length is to my ankles, but looks elegant. The material is soft and easy to move in. The dress fits perfectly to my curves. It's easy to zip and unzip. There is no show thru on the actual bodice of the dress. I washed on cold on delicate, and hung to dry. Read more
items.author: Ccbilbo

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Redfloral, Blackprint, Brown, Brownprint, Greenprint, White, Wineprint, Black, Brownfloral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
